description:
The text drawer is perfect if you want to display
additional information in a longer form that would not
fit into a text dialog.

props.name: tab
props.description: The name of the currently active tab

props.name: disabled
props.description: If `true`, the drawer form is disabled

props.name: icon
props.description: The default icon for the drawer header

props.name: id
props.description: A unique ID for the drawer

props.name: options
props.description: Option buttons for the drawer header

props.name: title
props.description: The default title for the drawer header

props.name: empty
props.description: Empty state message if no text is defined
